welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Fontenay-aux-Roses! Known for its picturesque streets and charming cafes, this city has so much to offer. We invite you to explore and experience all that Fontenay-aux-Roses has to offer during your stay. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal Sud
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal Ouest
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private and business aviation at Le Bourget Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
